snippet: “Off!,” a self-titled album of a Los Angeles band, updates a punk sound. In “A Different Ship,” Here We Go Magic starts songs simply and then adds more layers of sound.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews self-titled album by the Los Angeles Band Off!; Jon Pareles reviews album A Different Ship by the Brooklyn Band Here We Go Magic.

byline.original: By BEN RATLIFF and JON PARELES

lead_paragraph: “Off!,” a self-titled album of a Los Angeles band, updates a punk sound. In “A Different Ship,” Here We Go Magic starts songs simply and then adds more layers of sound.

headline.seo: New Albums From ‘Off!’ and Here We Go Magic
headline.main: New Albums From ‘Off!’ and Here We Go Magic
